title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] Deep dive into AWS Database Savings Plans (DAT326)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] 深入了解 AWS 数据库节省计划 (DAT326)
abstract: In this session, deep dive into the newly launched AWS Database Savings Plans, a flexible pricing model that works across multiple AWS database services. With Database Savings Plans, reduce your database costs by up to 35% when using serverless deployments and eligible instances over a 1-year term with no upfront payment. Learn how to analyze usage patterns, implement cost optimization strategies, and maximize savings while maintaining workload flexibility. Discover how to combine Database Savings Plans with existing pricing models and modernization initiatives. Walk away with best practices for optimizing database costs across your organization.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，深入了解新推出的AWS数据库节省计划，这是一种适用于多个AWS数据库服务的灵活定价模式。通过数据库节省计划，在使用无服务器部署和符合条件的实例时，可在1年期限内无需预付费用的情况下将数据库成本降低多达35%。学习如何分析使用模式、实施成本优化策略，并在保持工作负载灵活性的同时最大化节省。了解如何将数据库节省计划与现有定价模式和现代化举措相结合。掌握在整个组织中优化数据库成本的最佳实践。
